ruleSummaries.description: A link annotation and its associated content shall be enclosed in either a Link or Reference structure element

checks.errorMessage: A Link annotation is an Artifact or is nested within null tag (standard type = null) instead of Link or Reference

ruleSummaries.description: The PDF/UA version of a file shall be specified in the value of the Metadata entry in the document catalog using the PDF/UA identification schema

checks.errorMessage: The document metadata stream doesn't contain PDF/UA Identification Schema

ruleSummaries.description: If a label for a widget annotation is not present, a Contents entry shall be provided to supply description and context for the widget

checks.errorMessage: Widget annotation contains neither label nor Contents entry

ruleSummaries.description: The structure tree root shall contain a single Document structure element as its only child. The namespace for that element shall be specified as the PDF 2.0 namespace

checks.errorMessage: The structure tree root contains a single Document structure element, but this element is not within the PDF 2.0 namespace (namespace URI = http://iso.org/pdf/ssn)

ruleSummaries.description: All structure elements shall belong to, or be role mapped to, at least one of the following namespaces specified in ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.8.6: — the PDF 1.7 namespace; — the PDF 2.0 namespace; — the MathML namespace

checks.context: root/document[0]/StructTreeRoot[0](22 0 obj PDStructTreeRoot)/K[0](23 0 obj SEDocument Document)/K[0](24 0 obj SENonStandard Article)
checks.errorMessage: Non-standard structure type http://iso.org/pdf/ssn:/Article is not mapped to a standard type

ruleSummaries.description: The document catalog dictionary shall include a MarkInfo dictionary containing an entry, Marked, whose value shall be true

checks.errorMessage: MarkInfo dictionary is not present in the document catalog, or Marked entry is set to false or is not present in the MarkInfo dictionary (MarkInfo = null, Marked = null)

ruleSummaries.description: Content that is not considered real shall be an artifact

checks.errorMessage: Content is neither marked as Artifact nor tagged as real content

ruleSummaries.description: All destinations whose target lies within the current document shall be structure destinations

checks.errorMessage: Destination in Outline item, OpenAction or Link annotation is not a structure destination

ruleSummaries.description: The ViewerPreferences dictionary of the document catalog dictionary shall be present and shall contain at least the DisplayDocTitle key with a value of true, as described in ISO 32000-2:2020, Table 147

checks.errorMessage: ViewerPreferences dictionary is not present in the document Catalog, or DisplayDocTitle key is set to false or is not present in the ViewerPreferences dictionary (ViewerPreferences = null, DisplayDocTitle = null)

ruleSummaries.description: Every page that includes an annotation shall contain a Tabs entry in its page dictionary in accordance with ISO 32000-2:2020, Table 31, and its value shall be A, W or S

checks.errorMessage: A page with annotation(s) contains Tabs key with value null instead of A, W or S
A page with annotation(s) contains Tabs key with value null instead of A, W or S

ruleSummaries.description: The default natural language for content and text strings shall be specified using the Lang entry, with a non-empty value, in the catalog dictionary

checks.errorMessage: Catalog dictionary does not contain Lang entry

ruleSummaries.description: The font programs for all fonts used for rendering within a conforming file shall be embedded within that file, as defined in ISO 32000-2:2020, 9.9

checks.errorMessage: The font program is not embedded
The font program is not embedded
The font program is not embedded
The font program is not embedded

validationResult.statement: PDF file is not compliant with Validation Profile requirements.
